quest.name: Ever Skyward
journal:
Nimie is eager to get to work on your dragonsung tool.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

At your indication that you are braced for the trials ahead, Nimie divulges a few additional details as to what will be expected of you─most harrowingly, that a significant quantity of coating is required for your tool, and that you must provide no small number of materials accordingly. You had best take up your dragonsung tool right away if you are to present Denys with enough supplies for his goblin team.

※Please note that you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Your toil is rewarded with pot upon pot of mysterious gobbiegoo, and at last you are able to present Nimie with a sufficiency of the substance. Thankfully, she makes short work of applying it, and you are soon the proud─albeit slightly disgusted─owner of an augmented dragonsung tool. Loftier heights await, however, as she and the other Skysteel engineers have more plans in store!
objectives: With Dragonsung SawDragonsung Cross-pein HammerDragonsung Raising HammerDragonsung Lapidary HammerDragonsung Round KnifeDragonsung NeedleDragonsung AlembicDragonsung FrypanDragonsung PickaxeDragonsung HatchetDragonsung Fishing Rod in your inventory or Armoury Chest, deliver 90 Carpenter's Gobbiegoo90 Blacksmith's Gobbiegoo90 Armorer's Gobbiegoo90 Goldsmith's Gobbiegoo90 Leatherworker's Gobbiegoo90 Weaver's Gobbiegoo90 Alchemist's Gobbiegoo90 Culinarian's Gobbiegoo50 Miner's Gobbiegoo and 50 Botanist's Gobbiegoo and 6 Fisher's Gobbiegoo180 Oddly Specific Landborne Aethersand180 Oddly Specific Leafborne Aethersand to Nimie.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that upon completing the quest “Ever Skyward,” you will receive an augmented dragonsung tool for your current class of [Job].

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as another class.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Undertake this quest as an [Job]a [Job].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Be advised that once you have begun this quest, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please ensure that you have changed to your desired class before speaking with Nimie.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to receive the quest “Ever Skyward,” you must have [Error] equipped or in your inventory.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have already acquired [Error]. Should you wish to augment a different tool, please change to a different class and speak with Nimie again.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: Let's get to work, shall we? To review, the dragonsung tool you currently hold in your hand represents the third phase of the upgrade process. It started life as a prototype, which was upgraded to a proper Skysteel tool, then altered once more to take its current form.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: At the moment, we possess the know-how and resources to upgrade it as far as the fifth phase─two phases beyond where it stands now.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: If you're here for more work, you won't hear any complaints from me. To review, the dragonsung tool you currently have in hand represents the third phase of the upgrade process.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: For phase four, so to speak, we'll need an absolutely massive amount of the aforementioned goblin-made gunk. Which means you'll have to provide easily pulped, mashed, and otherwise pulverized materials for their use in equal measure.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: For phase four, so to speak, we'll need an absolutely massive amount of the aforementioned goblin-made gunk. Which means you'll have to provide easily pulped, mashed, and otherwise pulverized materials for their use in equal measure.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: And remember─you'll want to make use of your dragonsung tool. The so-called bond between tool and wielder aside, we'll need to measure your wear patterns for future designs.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: As he mentioned, Denys will be chained to his post in the manufactory for the foreseeable future, so it should be easy enough to find him once you have the materials─or before, should you need further clarification as to their nature.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: Once you have a sufficiency of the substance in question, bring it to me together with the tool itself. I'll see that it's safely and properly applied, and you'll walk away with a cutting-edge creation like none have ever seen. Or smelled. But never mind that.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: First, use your dragonsung tool to craft or harvest the necessary materials, and deliver them to Denys inside the manufactory.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: After receiving the appropriate goo from Denys, present it along with your tool to Nimie to complete the upgrade process.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To craft materials, open the Crafting Log, followed by Special Recipes from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select Sidequests, then lastly Skysteel Tools to locate applicable recipes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when crafting. Certain ingredients required to craft the items in question must be purchased via scrips or skybuilders' scrips.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Materials needed to upgrade a botanist's or miner's primary tool can be found in the Skysteel Tools section of the Gathering Log.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when gathering.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Upgrading a fisher's primary tool requires the use of specialized bait. This can be obtained by speaking to Denys.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when fishing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When making your final delivery to Nimie, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Feeling a bit at a loss, friend? I can hardly blame you─the process is not a simple one. Let us review: the first thing we ask of you is to procure the necessary raw materials by putting that tool of yours to good use.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: Once you have a sufficient quantity, deliver them to Denys inside the manufactory─his team of goblins will liquefy them in due time. Present the pots of goo you receive in exchange to Nimie along with the tool in question, and she'll see the process completed.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: First, use your dragonsung tool to craft or harvest the necessary materials, and deliver them to Denys inside the manufactory.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: After receiving the necessary augmentation unit from Denys, present it along with your tool to Nimie to complete the upgrade process.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To craft materials, open the Crafting Log, followed by Special Recipes from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select Sidequests, then lastly Skysteel Tools to locate applicable recipes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when crafting. Certain ingredients required to craft the items in question must be purchased via scrips or skybuilders' scrips.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Materials needed to upgrade a botanist's or miner's primary tool can be found in the Skysteel Tools section of the Gathering Log.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when gathering.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Upgrading a fisher's primary tool requires the use of specialized bait. This can be obtained by speaking to Denys.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when fishing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When making your final delivery to Nimie, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: All ready, you say? Excellent. I hope it wasn't too much trouble for you to track down all those obscure materials. In any event, if you wouldn't mind parting with your tool and the copious amounts of goo you presumably have on your person, I'll get right to work.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: Curious indeed. I can't wait to get back to my workshop and take a closer look. The job shouldn't take long, so why don't you just wait here?

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: Apologies for the delay, but I suspect you'll find it was worth the wait. Behold: your dragonsung tool now looks and works─and smells─like never before! I must say, this process was as educational as it was inspiring. You have my thanks for moving things along.

dialogue.name: NEILLEMARD
dialogue.text: You have my gratitude as well. With your cooperation, my colleagues and I have achieved a true technological breakthrough that would never have been possible otherwise.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: Thanks to your efforts, we've reached another milestone toward realizing the full potential of our tools.

dialogue.name: NIMIE
dialogue.text: But I'm certain you'd rather see for yourself. Take your augmented dragonsung tool with our blessing─and may it serve you well.
